item.title: Ahead Of Lobo, Jason Momoa’s New Apple TV+ Show Hits No. 1 Instantly
item.description: Jason Momoa's new Apple TV+ show, Chief of War, is racking up great reviews and is already No. 1 on the service.

item.title: ‘Battlefield 6’ Will Avoid Something ‘Call Of Duty’ Players Hate
item.description: Call of Duty keeps doing something that most fans hate, but Battlefield 6 is going to go out of its way to avoid it.
